All the comprehensions share some identical code.

- Bitbucket: https://bitbucket.org/logilab/astroid/issue/161
title: [easy] Duplicated code in the comprehensions in scoped_nodes.py
[easy] Duplicated code in the comprehensions in scoped_nodes.py

text: Closing. The only shared code they have right now is the postinit initialisation, which is only two lines long for each class. Other solutions would complicate the code needlessly (mixins or base classes).
